categories.name: Sponsorship
categories.description: Thanks to Sponsorship, you can financially support Furizon, enabling it to constantly improve its events and invest in new equipment beneficial for all participants. In exchange for your valuable contribution, you will be publicly thanked in the conbook of this edition, and also receive some special and exclusive gadgets, assigned based on the level you choose below.

categories.name: Extra Days
categories.description: If you want to arrive a day earlier or leave a day later to further socialize with other participants, enjoy the relaxation and services of the hotel, or explore the wonderful community of Cavalese, this is the right section for you!

categories.name: Room
categories.description: In this section, you can choose the type of room to stay in, as well as choose between the main hotel (Park Hotel Sacro Cuore) and the overflow hotel (Hotel San Valier). Remember that all convention activities and services (such as the fursuit lounge) will only be active in the main hotel. Selecting a certain type of room automatically places you, after paying your registration, in that specific type of room. You will be able to choose your roommates later in the reserved area of each participant. All roommates must purchase the same type of room! When purchasing a ticket for the convention, it is mandatory to also purchase a bed in one of the two affiliated hotels. The hotel fee for bed & breakfast is not optional.

items.name: Furizon Overlord - Early Bird
items.description: Choose this ticket if you want to join Furizon. You will be able to decide later for the extras.

items.name: Furizon Overlord - Daily VARIATIONS
items.description: TEST TEST TEST AAAAAAAAA RICORDARSI DI DOUBLE CHECKAREEEE

items.name: Furizon Overlord - Daily Tickets
items.description: This ticket will allow you to access, during the days you will select later, all areas of the convention reserved for participants and all services offered to participants. Excluded are all reserved events (such as those dedicated to Supersponsors). This ticket does not include a hotel bed, so all participants must leave the convention area at the end of the last scheduled activity and in any case no later than 02:00 on the day following the one purchased.

items.name: APS Furizon Membership Card
items.description: If you did not attend Riverside 2023 you will need to purchase an APS Furizon Card. This card will be valid for one year and will give you access to future events organized by Furizon until september 2024!

variations.name: Sponsor
variations.description: Thank you for helping us make Furizon better! With this sponsorship, you will get a T-shirt and the event gadget, as well as a special mention on the conbook!

variations.name: Supersponsor
variations.description: The best experience you can have at Furizon! With this, you will get all the benefits of the sponsor and some extra perks: express check-in, a free welcome drink, access to one exclusive themed aperitif, an exclusive gadget, discount (and priority) on the wellness center and access to the panoramic photo-shoot organized by Furizon!

items.name: Early Arrival
items.description: Get one extra day at the beginning of the con to settle in and make your first friends in a relaxed environment.

items.name: Late Departure
items.description: Get one extra night of sleep

variations.name: Park Hotel Sacro Cuore (main hotel) - Single room
variations.description: Purchase a place in a single room in the main hotel.

variations.name: Park Hotel Sacro Cuore (main hotel) - Double
variations.description: Purchase a place in a double room in the main hotel.

variations.name: Park Hotel Sacro Cuore (main hotel) - Triple
variations.description: Purchase a place in a triple room in the main hotel.

variations.name: Park Hotel Sacro Cuore (main hotel) - Quadruple
variations.description: Purchase a place in a 4-beds room in the main hotel.

variations.name: Park Hotel Sacro Cuore (main hotel) - Quintuple
variations.description: Purchase a place in a 5-beds room in the main hotel.

variations.name: Hotel San Valier (overflow hotel) - Double
variations.description: Purchase a place in a double room in the overflow hotel.

items.name: Daily 4th June
items.description: Entry valid only for June 4, 2024, from 16:00 to 02:00 next day.

items.name: Daily 5th June
items.description: Entry valid only for June 5, 2024, from 10:00 to 02:00 next day.

items.name: Daily 6th June
items.description: Entry valid only for June 6, 2024, from 10:00 to 02:00 next day.

items.name: Daily 7th June
items.description: Entry valid only for June 7, 2024, from 10:00 to 02:00 next day.

questions.question: Fiscal Code
questions.help_text: Required for the issue of receipt and proper membership as a Member of the Association.

questions.question: Fursona Name / Nickname
questions.help_text: This will be printed on the badge and shown in public pages.

Do you have any food allergies to report to the hotel staff?

question.it: Hai qualche allergia alimentare da segnalare allo staff dell'hotel?
